# delegate

**Instance Property**

The document browser’s delegate.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var delegate: (any UIDocumentBrowserViewControllerDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The delegate object must implement the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDocumentBrowserViewControllerDelegate] protocol.

## Responding to browser events

- **UIDocumentBrowserViewControllerDelegate**: The protocol you implement to respond as the user interacts with the document browser.
- **importDocument(at:nextToDocumentAt:mode:completionHandler:)**: Imports a document into the same location as an existing document.
